/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding life to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
